Ss3 : Driving safely is an important issue which could minimize traffic congestion and traffic accidents when people participate in traffic. Traffic is a difficult problems to solve (sốp) . In Vietnam, these problems are very difficult with the potential (po ten xồ) dangers when participate in traffic. To avoid such dangers and to overcome traffic situation(si tru ây sion), we need to know how to drive safely to protect yourself first and other commuters. Therefore, it is the reason why I choose the topic : Safe driving. In this assignment, I will focus on four main ideas : traffic situation in Vietnam, safe driving and its importance ,safe driving tips and my driving experience. Ss4 : As we all know that traffic congestion in Vietnam, (đặcbiệt)especially(ếch pách sồ ly) in some urban(u bừn) areas is an alarming (a lo ming) issue that need handle(hand đồ) as soon as possible. Congestion problems (xảy ra)occur(óc cò) (thường xuyên) frequently (fish quận ly) and unavoidable . Ss5 : From the causes of traffic problems, traffic accident is a matter of (mối quan ngại)concern(cưn sơ). Traffic accidents can cause serious consequences(con so quèn sợt)(hậu quả nghiêm trọng) and it is also the leading cause of serious injury and death in Vietnam. S6 Safe driving is the actions of driving a vehicle(via cồ) in traffic for the purpose of efficient(ơ fech sion) (sự lưu thông)circulation(sơ cưu lây sion) and avoids the (rắc rối) hassle(hand sồ) and safety when participating traffic. For example speed and distance(dis từn) between vehicles participate in traffic, compliance(com plen) with traffic laws and traffic lights, and drink beer or wine, do not drive. S7 In my opinion, the first reason why I have to drive carefully is safely. Traffic accidents can have serious consequences causing injuries and even death. Secondly, Safe driving help more eco-friendly. And finally, I can make money when driving safely participate traffic. The benefits of safe driving are very important when participating in traffic. S8 : The first and most important thing when you participate in traffic is compliance with traffic laws and traffic lights. Traffic laws are the laws that you must follow to (đảm bảo) ensure(in sơ) the safety and efficient for traffic between vehicles. S9 : Secondly, everyone should understand and comply with (quy định)regulations (re gu..) on the speed and safety distance between vehicles when entering(bước vào) the traffic. S10 Thirdly, be aware(ờ where) of the harms(hại) of being drunk. And the consequences of drinking beer or wine cause the serious accident. In my opinion, These tips are very effective. When in traffic, I should (chịu đựng) obey by the traffic laws and traffic lights and I drive, I should pay attention to the speed and distance between vehicles and I will not drive when I drink beer or wine. S11 Throughout the safe dring tips and the importance of safe driving, I have drawn(rút ra) experience that is to pay attention and very focused when driving. Firstly, every time I drive, I always obey traffic laws and and follow traffic lights. Secondly, I never work during the time I drive because it is really dangerous to cause accidents.And finally, I never drink wine or beer when I drive because I cannot focus on the route and when I take the taxi or drive a car, I usually wear a seat belt.
